meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unsatisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The unsatisfactoriness of the situation left everyone feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent2: The unsatisfactoriness of the product led to many customer complaints.
meanings.sent3: The unsatisfactoriness of the cake made it look like a sad, deflated balloon.
meanings.sent4: The unsatisfactoriness of the weather cast a gloomy shadow over the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The unsatisfactoriness of the movie plot made it hard to enjoy the film.

meanings.definition: The condition of not being satisfactory or adequate.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't ignore the unsatisfactoriness of her work performance any longer.
meanings.sent2: The unsatisfactoriness of the repair job became evident soon after completion.
meanings.sent3: The unsatisfactoriness of the excuse was so obvious that no one believed it.
meanings.sent4: The unsatisfactoriness of the plan was like trying to fit a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The unsatisfactoriness of the solution left them searching for a better alternative.
